queries.name: orders_by_pk
queries.query:
query orders_by_pk($id: uuid!) {
  orders_by_pk(id: $id) {
    adres
    created_at
    email
    id
    klanttype
    naam
    opmerkingen
    producten
    telefoon
    totaal
  }
}

queries.name: orders
queries.query:
query orders {
  orders {
    adres
    created_at
    email
    id
    klanttype
    naam
    opmerkingen
    producten
    telefoon
    totaal
  }
}

queries.name: insert_orders_one
queries.query:
mutation insert_orders_one($object: orders_insert_input!) {
  insert_orders_one(object: $object) {
    adres
    created_at
    email
    id
    klanttype
    naam
    opmerkingen
    producten
    telefoon
    totaal
  }
}

queries.name: update_orders_by_pk
queries.query:
mutation update_orders_by_pk($id: uuid!, $object: orders_set_input!) {
  update_orders_by_pk(pk_columns: {id: $id}, _set: $object) {
    adres
    created_at
    email
    id
    klanttype
    naam
    opmerkingen
    producten
    telefoon
    totaal
  }
}

queries.name: delete_orders_by_pk
queries.query:
mutation delete_orders_by_pk($id: uuid!) {
  delete_orders_by_pk(id: $id) {
    adres
    created_at
    email
    id
    klanttype
    naam
    opmerkingen
    producten
    telefoon
    totaal
  }
}
